courseDetails: Introduction to C Programming: covers basics, syntax, and concepts in C for beginners, emphasizing problem-solving and foundational coding skills.
Introduction to Algorithms: Covers fundamental algorithm design and analysis, emphasizing problem-solving and algorithmic thinking.
Introduction to C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms: Learn C++ basics and algorithmic thinking for efficient problem-solving.
Basic Data Structures: course covers fundamental concepts in data structures, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.
Introduction to OOP Python: covers object-oriented programming principles using Python, focusing on classes, inheritance, and encapsulation.
Software Engineering: course teaches software development methodologies, project management, and best practices for building high-quality software systems.
AWS, Cloud Computing: offers comprehensive training on Amazon Web Services, covering cloud infrastructure and services for scalable applications.
Database (MySQL): teaches relational database concepts, SQL queries, and MySQL database management for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Problem-Solving Part: hones critical thinking, algorithms, and coding skills for effective problem-solving in various contexts.
